Interface Summary
ContentDelegator Specifies the methods that must be implement to be a ContentDelegator for the UserAgent.
DocumentListener An interface that defined callback methods related to document-level operations in the UserAgent.

Exception Summary
MultipleFound Represents an error caused by an finding multiple instances of an object when only one was anticipated.
NodeNotFound Represents an error caused by an inability to find a Node.
NotFound Represents an error caused by an inability to locate the target of a search.
SearchException Represents an error related to a search function.
 

Package com.jaunt_api Description

Jaunt v. 0.9.0 Beta [website] is a lightweight, headless browser API created by Tom Cervenka. Unlike a regular browser which renders webpages for viewing, a headless browser is used to programmatically interact with websites. Jaunt also make it easy to work with XML-based web-services or parse XML documents. It is an intuitive and powerful API for automating tasks that do not require client-side Javascript interpretation, including screen scraping and crawling websites, filling out and submitting web-based forms, interfacing with web-based APIs as a REST client, automated testing of web-based user interfaces, and automating web-related tasks by creating web-bots. 

Features:

- Document types: HTML, XHTML, XML
- Protocols: HTTP, HTTPS, basic authentication
- HTTP Header inspection/manipulation
- DOM navigation
- Regular-expression-enabled querying
- Component model for Documents, Forms, etc.
- Form request permutations
- HTTP proxy support.
- Single document, synchronous programming model
